imdb.title: Nabari no ô
imdb.plot: In the shadows of this world, ninjas fight for control of an ancient technique which holds untold strength. This coveted power dwells within apathetic Miharu, a fact the guy really couldn't care less about - until the rival clans ...

episodes.title: Mezameru mono
episodes.plot: Ninja clans battle in the shadows to claim a mystical power - the Shinrabansho - residing within Miharu. Whoever controls its strength will control the world.

episodes.title: Raimei, kitaru
episodes.plot: Raimei thinks Miharu would benefit from training with a mysterious Fuma teacher. But when they arrive to meet him, something sinister seems to be afoot.

episodes.title: Shûgeki
episodes.plot: New enemies and amazing powers are unleashed as Miharu's group battles an incredibly skilled band of ninjas bent on stealing the arcane secrets of the Fuma way.

episodes.title: Duty Declared
episodes.plot: Miharu questions his fate, and his friends and enemies set out on the same mission: gather the forbidden hijutsu of each ninja village.

episodes.title: Greed
episodes.plot: With so many coveting the Shinrabansho, Miharu must face that everyone around him likely has ulterior motives - even Raimei, who wants to make her brother Raiko pay for his sins.

episodes.title: Choices
episodes.plot: Yoite forces Miharu to make a life and death decision - and no matter his choice, the pain surrounding the battle for the Shinrabansho will multiply.

episodes.title: A Mind Made Up
episodes.plot: The mind-reading leader of the Togakushi asks the Banten ninjas to assassinate a powerful businessman. Their reward would be great, but the cost of declining her demand could be greater.

episodes.title: A Mind Passed Along
episodes.plot: Violence erupts as the Banten ninjas help Yae execute her revenge. But in the world of the ninja, sometimes it isn't obvious who is really pulling the strings.

episodes.title: Prelude
episodes.plot: Miharu considers using the Shinrabansho to help ailing Yoite, even as he struggles to understand the extent of its power. Meanwhile, Raimei might get her chance to exact vengeance.

episodes.title: Polka. Raimei and Raikou
episodes.plot: Raimei is in serious jeopardy from the wounds inflicted by her brother. Yoite finds his condition worsening as well, and only Miharu can help ease his suffering.

episodes.title: Curtain Call
episodes.plot: Raimei is back in fighting form, and as she rushes to confront her brother once more, she learns the truth behind her family's downfall.

episodes.title: Determination
episodes.plot: After Miharu offers his services to a faction he once called foe, the ninjas of Banten and Kairoshu receive an invitation to visit the Koga village.

episodes.title: Nemuranu manabiya
episodes.plot: When a battle breaks out for control of the village academy, the ninjas of Banten and Kairoshu find their plans to steal the Koga hijutsu derailed.

episodes.title: Yoru no soko
episodes.plot: The horrible truth behind the Koga hijutsu places the ninjas of Banten and Kairoshu in grave danger. As his friends fall, Miharu calls for the power inside him to awaken!

episodes.title: Morning Parting
episodes.plot: Miharu edges toward unleashing the Shinrabansho, and fallen Koichi's greatest secret is revealed. As the battle rages, the ailing Koga master looks for one worthy of the clan's power.

episodes.title: Visitor from Afar
episodes.plot: With both immortality and impending death in the air, and Miharu's hidden power in the balance, a race to claim the Banten hijutsu begins.

episodes.title: The Moment of Collapse
episodes.plot: Raimei does her best to keep Yukimi from getting the Banten hijutsu. Miharu won't explain his motivation for joining the Kairoshu, but the fact that he's displaying motivation at all disturbs Tobari.

episodes.title: The Voice That Calls Out
episodes.plot: When Yoite learns how little time remains before his death, he lashes out at Raiko and the comatose Gau with his kira - but the results of the attack are not what anyone expects.

episodes.title: Profile of an Angel of Death
episodes.plot: With the Banten hijutsu so difficult to obtain, Miharu and Yoite suspect that the Togakushi secret of Izuna Shingan might be their only chance at awakening the Shinrabansho.

episodes.title: Towards Togakushi
episodes.plot: Miharu tries the Izuna Shingan to prevent Yoite from dying - but now that the Kairoshu consider him a traitor, Yoite's sickness isn't the only threat to his life.

episodes.title: Ambition
episodes.plot: Miharu, Yoite, and Yae are held captive by the Kairoshu - and their well-being isn't high on Hattori's list of concerns as he reveals his ultimate plans for the Shinrabansho.

episodes.title: Chaos
episodes.plot: Miharu and Yoite are on the run, but there's more than one faction within the Kairoshu ranks interested in ruining their escape - and they aren't working together.

episodes.title: Activation
episodes.plot: As the warriors in the secret war to control the world begin to fall in greater numbers, Yoite's introduction to kira is revealed - and the Shinrabansho stirs.

episodes.title: Engetsurin
episodes.plot: The Shinrabansho has awakened. In the midst of the chaos, Tobari unwittingly gives Hattori everything he needs to claim Miharu's power - unless someone finds the strength to stop him.

episodes.title: Two
episodes.plot: Miharu wakes up in the hospital, healing from the awesome power of the Shinrabansho - but Yoite has vanished. Not everyone thinks he's dead - and some set out to prove their hunch.

episodes.title: Spinning Hearts
episodes.plot: No matter what pain pushed them into the lives they lead, Miharu and Yoite decide to make their own decisions in the face of destiny - and those in the middle of a secret war finally find peace.
